column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The police force of the Anti-Human Trafficking and Minor Protection Office detained a foreigner in connection with the case of child prostitution.------The operation took place at 6 pm on March 2
column4: 2019 in a massage joint called Srey Nean 871 in Sangkat Kakap 2
column6: Phnom Penh.------Police say  DANNY LEE  POPE
column9: was detained. An investigation was carried out into the suspect and underage sex workers on the premises for 2 days before the raid.------Five girls were also handed over to the Social Affairs Office of Phnom Penh.------h
